title: I BOUGHT A CHAMPION - DIDNT GET HIM - LOST IP !!! WTF?!
body: I bought Nocturne 2 days ago with IP, didnt get him in my champion pool, says he's locked, but if i go to account transaction history it says that nocturne has been bought!!?!?!?? 4800 hard earned ip wasted down the drain!? I wrote to riot support immediately but have been waiting for almost 3 days still no answer. I cant believe this... does someone know how to fix this bug? HELP PLEASE!

replies.body: It looks like some players on EUNE had an issue unlocking some content.  I was able to verify Nocturne for you, and made sure it got added to your account.  Sorry for the delay as well in ticket response, we might be a bit backed up at the moment.  I hope that helps!
I have the same issue after purchasing Rakan please help :3 :3
Thanks a bunch, kind player support specialist ^_^
